title: TFR Ep. 570: Shang-Chi And The Legend Of The Ten Rings , Stillwater, 5 Favorite MCU Villains
description:
This week on The First Run, Chis and Matt discuss the latest film in the MCU as Phase 4 continues with ‘Shang-Chi And The Legend Of The Ten Rings’.  Wait, 10 Rings?  Didn’t we see that in Iron Man 3?  Does Shang-Chi escape its MCU template, or is it just another ride on the same merry-go-around, again?  Then Matt Damon stars in Tom McCarthy’s ‘Stillwater’.  After helming a Best Picture winner with ‘Spotlight’, then a Disney+ adaptation of the Timmy Failure book series, McCarthy returns with a fictionalized take of the Amanda Knox story.  Or not.  There’s the positively delicious review of the big releases on Physical Media, featuring the Straight to DVD and Streaming Picks of the Week.  The show then wraps with Matt and Chris sharing their 5 Favorite MCU Villains.  Who makes the cut; Klaw? Blacklash? JJJ?!?  Tune in to find out!

00:00-17:14: Intro/Shang Chi And The Legend Of The Ten Rings

17:15-30:22: Physical Media Picks

30:23-38:41: Stillwater

38:42-49:23: 5 Favorite MCU Villains

49:24-51:17: Wrap Up

Theme music by Jamal Malachi Ford-Bey

Twitter

Instagram

Facebook

This week on The First Run, Chis and Matt discuss the latest film in the MCU as Phase 4 continues with ‘Shang-Chi And The Legend Of The Ten Rings’.  Wait, 10 Rings?  Didn’t we see that in Iron Man 3?  Does Shang-Chi escape its MCU template, or is it just another ride on the same merry-go-around, again?  Then Matt Damon stars in Tom McCarthy’s ‘Stillwater’.  After helming a Best Picture winner with ‘Spotlight’, then a Disney+ adaptation of the Timmy Failure book series, McCarthy returns with a fictionalized take of the Amanda Knox story.  Or not.  There’s the positively delicious review of the big releases on Physical Media, featuring the Straight to DVD and Streaming Picks of the Week.  The show then wraps with Matt and Chris sharing their 5 Favorite MCU Villains.  Who makes the cut; Klaw? Blacklash? JJJ?!?  Tune in to find out!
